goal.en: One of the main challenges in understanding biological systems is to link microscopic changes (eg, molecules, cells, hormones, structures, etc.) to dynamic changes observed at the overall level of the organism. To overcome the difficulty of establishing a link between the microscopic and macroscopic properties of a nonlinear system, a quantitative description of the system as a whole is critical. This course introduces a variety of systematic approaches to quantitatively describe the dynamic patterns generated by the system.
goal.ch: 了解生物系統的主要挑戰之一，在於將微觀層次的改變（例如：分子、細胞、激素、結構等）連結到在有機體整體層次觀察到的動態變化。欲克服在非線性系統微觀與巨觀性質間建立連結本質上的困難，在系統整體層次上的定量描述方法至關重要。本課程即在介紹各種系統性的方法，定量描述系統產生之動態模式。
